org.cantaloupe.audio.source

Interface ISource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalSource, PositionedSource, SharedLocalSource, WorldSource

    public interface ISource
    An interface containing basic source methods.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clears the source.
      java.lang.String getID()
      Gets the ID of the source.
      java.util.List<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets a list of players which are able to hear this source.
      SourceSettings getSettings()
      Gets the settings of the source.
      Sound getSound()
      Gets the sound of the source.
      void removePlayerInt(Player player)
      Removes a player without sending a packet to the client.
      void setSettings(SourceSettings settings)
      Sets the source's settings.
      void setSound(Sound sound)
      Sets the source's sound.
      void setSound(Sound sound, boolean update)
      Sets the source's sound.

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the source.

      • removePlayerInt

        void removePlayerInt(Player player)
        Removes a player without sending a packet to the client.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to remove

      • setSettings

        void setSettings(SourceSettings settings)
        Sets the source's settings.
        Parameters:
        settings - The settings to set

      • setSound

        void setSound(Sound sound,
              boolean update)
        Sets the source's sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - The sound to set
        update - Whether the currently playing sound should be stopped and replaced with the new one
